      • belowMin_NoOfPlayers_setupPlayersTest

        public void belowMin_NoOfPlayers_setupPlayersTest()
                                           throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
        Tests that an InvalidNumberOfPlayersException is thrown when the number of players is less than 2.
        Throws:
        InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - is thrown if the number of players is < 2 or > 8 (expected).
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if a Map instances has already been created (not expected).

      • aboveMax_NoOfPlayers_setupPlayersTest

        public void aboveMax_NoOfPlayers_setupPlayersTest()
                                           throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
        Tests that an InvalidNumberOfPlayersException is thrown when the number of players is greater than 8.
        Throws:
        InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - is thrown if the number of players is < 2 or > 8 (expected).
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if a Map instances has already been created (not expected).

      • inrange_NoOfPlayers_setupPlayersTest

        public void inrange_NoOfPlayers_setupPlayersTest()
                                          throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
        Tests that the players array is initialized with the correct number of Player instances if input is valid.
        Throws:
        InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - is thrown if the number of players is < 2 or > 8 (not expected).
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if a Map instances has already been created (not expected).

      • mapInitializedBeforePlayers_setupPlayersTest

        public void mapInitializedBeforePlayers_setupPlayersTest()
                                                  throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
        Tests that a SetupOperationPrecedenceException is thrown when a Map has already been initialised before the Players.
        Throws:
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if a Map instances has already been created (expected).
        InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - is thrown if the number of players is < 2 or > 8 (not expected).

      • noPlayersInitialized_setupMapTest

        public void noPlayersInitialized_setupMapTest()
                                       throws InvalidMapSizeException
        Tests that a SetupOperationPrecedenceException is thrown when no players have been initialized before Map init.
        Throws:
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if MainGame.players is null (expected).
        InvalidMapSizeException - is thrown if the map_size is invalid (not expected).

      • belowMin_MapSize_setupMapTest

        public void belowMin_MapSize_setupMapTest()
                                   throws InvalidMapSizeException
        Tests that an InvalidMapSizeException is thrown when the map_size is less than 5.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapSizeException - is thrown if the map_size is invalid (expected).
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if MainGame.players is null (not expected).

      • aboveMax_MapSize_setupMapTest

        public void aboveMax_MapSize_setupMapTest()
                                   throws InvalidMapSizeException
        Tests that an InvalidMapSizeException is thrown when the map_size is greater than 50.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapSizeException - is thrown if the map_size is invalid (expected).
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if MainGame.players is null (not expected).

      • smallMap_Min5Players_setupMapTest

        public void smallMap_Min5Players_setupMapTest()
                                       throws InvalidMapSizeException
        Tests that an InvalidMapSizeException is thrown when the map_size is greater than 5 but less than 8 for 5 or more initialized players.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapSizeException - is thrown if the map_size is invalid (expected).
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if MainGame.players is null (not expected).

      • inrange_MapSize_setupMapTest

        public void inrange_MapSize_setupMapTest()
                                  throws InvalidMapSizeException
        Tests that a map of the appropriate size is initialized.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapSizeException - is thrown if the map_size is invalid (not expected).
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if MainGame.players is null (not expected).

        Tests that a SetupOperationPrecedenceException is thrown when no Players have been initialized.
        Throws:
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if no Players or Map has been initialized (expected).

        Throws:
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if no Players or Map has been initialized (expected).

      • correct_setPlayerPositionsTest

        public void correct_setPlayerPositionsTest()
        Tests that all player positions have been initialized correctly.
        Throws:
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if no Players or Map has been initialized (expected).

      • noDirPathSpecified_writeHTMLFilesTest

        public void noDirPathSpecified_writeHTMLFilesTest()
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Tests that a SetupOperationPrecedenceException is thrown when no directory path has been specified.
        Throws:
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if no directory path or Map has been initialized (expected).
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is a failure in persisting to disk [generally fatal] (not expected).

      • noMapInitialized_writeHTMLFilesTest

        public void noMapInitialized_writeHTMLFilesTest()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Tests that a SetupOperationPrecedenceException is thrown when no Map instance has been initialized.
        Throws:
        SetupOperationPrecedenceException - is thrown if no directory path or Map has been initialized (expected).
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is a failure in persisting to disk [generally fatal] (not expected).
